strings.schematron.title: INSPIRE SDD(S) Rules
strings.precondition.nodataset: The current metadata is not about a dataset.
strings.precondition.dataset: The current metadata documents a dataset.
strings.tg4.missing: QualityInfo missing. For each spatial data dataset(serie), there shall be one and only one set of quality information (dataQualityInfo element) scoped to "dataset" or "series".
strings.tg4.toomany: Too many QualityInfo elements. For each spatial data dataset(serie), there shall be one and only one set of quality information (dataQualityInfo element) scoped to "dataset" or "series".
